name: Shapetris
description:
The objective of the game is to rotate the white triangle and make a smooth collision with the yellow triangles.

 It might seem simple but its quite difficult at the beginning. 
The idea is to align the triangles to form a collision.

Submitted at Blackthornprod GameJam

More Info Here: http://blog.evancejaye.com/2018/10/shapetris-game-unusual-yet-cool-new.html
